channel.title: UEFI on Aravind I M
channel.description: Recent content in UEFI on Aravind I M

item.title: How to install Arch Linux with UEFI + LUKS + LVM + BTRFS + Unified Kernel Image + System D Boot + Secure Boot
item.description: Installation Steps 1. Connect to Wifi Source: iwctl # iwctl [iwd]# device list [iwd]# device deviceName set-property Powered on [iwd]# station deviceName scan [iwd]# station deviceName get-networks [iwd]# station deviceName connect SSID # exit (i) Check internet $ ping archlinux.org 2. Check system time $ timedatectl 3. Partition disks (i) Check disk # fdisk -l (ii) Create partitions disk Enter fdisk # fdisk /dev/sdX Create GPT label Command (m for help): g Created a new GPT disklabel (GUID: .
